img_above_text:
## How to Find the Skandha of Choice
* **Location: Chapter 4: (The Webbed Hollow, Webbed Hollow, The Purifying Spring).**
img_below_text:
The Skandha of Choice can be found in Chapter 4. Go right from The Purifying Spring Keeper's Choice and up the stairs and through the gap in the wall.
![Five Skandhas \(6\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/d/d4/Five_Skandhas_%286%29.png)

img_summary: The image depicts a scene from the game *Black Myth: Wukong*, showing the player character standing in a dimly lit cave environment. A red arrow highlights the path forward, pointing toward a gap in the wall illuminated by light in the distance. This visual serves as a guide for players to locate the Skandha of Choice in Chapter 4, directing them to proceed up the stairs and through the indicated opening.
